title: Announcing the first Immersive Music Video NFT collection that rewards continuous engagement: Wayha by Bosa x Klezma
content:encoded:
For the past 15 years I have been promoting, researching, and building in music.

Over the years I have discovered artists such as:

  • Machine Gun Kelly

  • Chance the Rapper

  • Paramore

  • Atreyu

  • Avenged Sevenfold

  • Luke Christopher

  • Mac Miller

  • Kid Cudi

  • and more.

When I found good music I would post the Youtube like on my friends’ facebook walls .

Then my friends would start listening to the artists, and sooner or later the artists I found before anyone else would get big.

I am sure many of us have experienced this exact thing before.

We find an artist before anyone else. We get our friends into them, feel a sense of pride that we found them first, and that we were one of their first supporters.

Especially when they blow up.

But the thing is: we get nothing for it.

And believe it or not, although we think the artist gets a lot for it. They actually don’t get as much as you think.

Yes, they might get traction. But they have no idea where it came from.

Imagine the possibilities if our favorite artists knew we discovered them before anyone else. Imagine if they knew we shared and supported their music before anyone else.

And imagine they could reward us for our early support with life changing experiences and access that only a select group of “superfans” could get.

This is invaluable data.

A proper analogy would be if you didn’t know who your first 1000 users or their demographics, on your product. Imagine how crazy that would sound to any tech company.

And today artists don’t have access to it. Not even in the current stage of Music NFTs.

This is exactly why we decided to solve with the Wayha by Bosa collection, the first Immersive music video collection and our new update to Klezma.

Here is what you need to know about Wayha by Bosa x Klezma 👇

First thing’s first: Who is Stephan Jacobs aka Bosa? 👨‍🎤

­­

With nearly 150,000 followers on Soundcloud, Stephan Jacobs (aka Bosa) has established himself as one of the most innovative producers and independent artists in electronic music.

He has worked with A$AP Rocky, Brockhampton, Run The Jewels, Benny Benassi, Showtek, Emancipator, Run DMT, Ill-Gates, James Zabiela, DVBBS, Martin Garrix, and Griz more.

Stephan has a hefty resume under his belt for programming shows and running music on some of the largest concerts, worldwide.

Supercool. So what about this 🔥 drop?

Wayha is the first music video collection . (As we all know visuals add a whole other layer to expression)

The collection has each part of the music video in the form of 157 digital collectibles broken into 3 categories with each unique collectible being a 1/1:

  1. 111 Wayha Art NFTs (Still image) - 30 USD (approx .025 ETH)

  2. 33 Wayha “Fisheye View” Art NFTS (Still image) - 40 USD (approx .03 ETH)

  3. 13 Video NFTs (Visual + Sound) - 50 USD (approx .04 ETH)

Each collector gets access to the private Wayha Launch party in LA where Stephan will perform, but depending on what category you collect from, you get more VIP access.

Perks of NFTs

157 (all) - Access to private party

33 Fisheye - A Chance to win 1 hour Masterclass / virtual meeting with Bosa.

(13) Music Video NFTs - A Chance to spend day with Bosa in the studio.

In addition to that, all collectors will also get future VIP access to all things Bosa.

The public drop will be January 3rd, 2023.

👉Click here to add it to your calendar and see the collection page + details👈

Bosa will also be giving away free collectibles via socials. Follow him on Instagram and Twitter to see daily giveaways.

­So wait, what is this immersive part? 🤔 ­

Wait for it….

🤘🏾Introducing Klezma Bounties: Where it pays to be an early adopter 🔥

Remember all those times where you found artists before anyone else and told your friends about an artist they HAD to listen to?

Well now being an early adopter pays off.

Bosa will be utilizing our new feature: Bounties.

Bounties allow fans and collectors to get even more rewards and VIP access to their favorite artists, the more they are engaged in that artist's journey.

This includes getting access to both physical and digital events, first collectible drops, content, and more.

Bounties are usually in the form of sharing the music in some sort of fashion.

For instance: using the music in your new cat video on Tiktok. (yes - we have gotten to the point where cat videos are viral).

­

So I can collect Stephan's collectibles AND get more badges and access the more I engage with him? 😦

Exactly. But that's not all.

Introducing: First 100 Early Adopter Badges 🥇

In addition to being able to complete bounties, you can also get badges for being the first 100 supporters of an artist.

Badges are claimed by:

  • following the artist on Klezma 💜

  • being one of their first collectors🥇

  • being one of the first bounty completers (that is definitely not a word) 😎

  • being one of the first to share an artists music🔁

As said, there will only be 100 of these badges for each artist. Ever. And they will be shown on your Klezma Profile (oh yea, we incorporated profiles) 👀

And artists will be able to see who their biggest supporters are and reward accordingly.

So now it really pays to be an early adopter.

My brain is exploding. Can you sum this all up for me?

I know. It’s alot. I gotchu.

  1. WayIt is the first music video collection. Every collectible is a piece of the video.

  2. Wayha is Immersive which means that means it rewards people based on not only what they collect, but on their engagement. Wayha allows fans and collectors to gain a special badges if they are one of the first 100 collectors or followers of Stephan Jacobs (aka Bosa) on Klezma.

  3. In addition to that, fans and collectors have a chance to gain even more badges and access to Bosa, including first listen to his next single (coming soon) if they complete bounties, which are usually in the form of sharing the music in some sort of fashion.

The collection has each part of the music video in the form of 157 digital collectibles broken into 3 categories with each unique collectible being a 1/1:

  1. 111 Wayha Art NFTs - 30 USD (approx .025 ETH)

  2. 33 Wayha Fisheye View NFTS - 40 USD (approx .03 ETH)

  3. 13 Video NFTs - 50 USD (approx .04 ETH)

Perks for collectors

157 (all) - Access to private party

33 Fisheye - A Chance to win 1 hour Masterclass / virtual meeting with Bosa.

(13) Video NFTs - A Chance to spend day with Bosa in the studio.

In addition to that, all collectors will also get future VIP access to all things Bosa.

Bosa will also be giving away d free collectibles via socials starting December 23rd.

Follow him on Instagram and Twitter to see daily giveaways.

The public drop will be January 3rd, 2023.

👉Click here to add it to your calendar and see the collection page + details👈

See you all soon!
